 1998-06071998-04-060,  JUS,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisGranting of a LEAVE OF ABSENCE to the Hon. Mr. Justice WILLIAM L. HOYT, a Judge of The Court of Appeal of New Brunswick, for a period of one year, in order to allow him to serve on the Inquiry into the events that occurred at events that occurred at Londonderry, Northern Ireland, on January 30, 1972.
